title: Buang Hong
overview: Hi-so girl Pimlapat is the daughter of a wealthy family, has a relationship with a great guy and is a well-know supermodel, but her life turns upside down when she loses everything. Her boyfriend dumps her, her father passes away and her stephmother swindles all his wealth. Within a blink of an eye, Pimlapas becomes a poor orphan. Being desperate, she is contacted by a mysterious person and becomes a swindler herself until she starts to have feelings for the guy she was suppose to swindle.
